name: Sleepy Danger
description:
Sleepy Danger is an interactive single-player game. 

You are falling asleep, but you cannot have any good dreams until you destroy your nightmares! You will be put through a series of obstacles, try to make it to the end! 

For the controls, use the arrow keys on your keyboard to move around. If you want to select something or talk to someone, click the 'Z' key on your keyboard. To move certain objects, press and hold the 'Z' key and move your avatar. 

Good luck, Dreamer!

*** used GB Studio for the creation of this game ***
